OOC: Hello, it's me Crow_lord(and for you really old members back in the 
Biostinger days, it Proto) Well Yan said I could join again.  I hope all of 
you will enjoy my rpging and all that.  Well here goes...

BIC:
�Hugar�

   Hugar press his com button and set it to the Ship he was following 
frequency.

   "Hedge, you are under arrest, please stop your vehicle and surrender." 
Hugar says as he press his throttle forward more, already knowing the 
answer.

   "Never, you slagging oil rag." Hedge says as she reads her scanners.  
"Follow me into the Asteroid range why don't you."

   "You won't get away just like the rest of your cronies didn't get away.  
Face it, the Cybertron Mob is no more, if you surrender now I'll go easy on 
you, send you to the best prison.  Just stop this!"  Hugar says hoping to 
get across to Hedge.

   "If I'll surrender, they'll kill me.  I have to run for my life, and the 
Cybertron Mob."  Hedge says as she enter the Asteroid field.

   "No Hedge this is suicide."  Hugar says as he turns to the scanners.  
"Hmmm, what planets are we near.  Mars at 9:30 and Jupiter at 3:13 from me."

   "No, surrendering is suicide.  So, are you going to follow me?"  Hedge 
says as she dodges a Asteroid.

   "Have to."  Hugar says as he enters the Asteroid field.  Hugar's ship is 
hit by an Asteroid.

   "Ship is hit, ship is hit, please eject from this ship before it reaches 
armageddon in 3 minutes.  The escape pods are located in the rear of the 
ship."  The computer says

   Hugar runs to the rear of the ship and open the escape pod ship door.  He 
grabs his picture off a nearby dresser and jumps into the Pod and blasts 
off.  He looks out his window as he sees his ship blow up.  Hugar then looks 
up and sees an Asteroid heading right for him.  It hits him as his pod is 
knocked towards Earth.  Hugar circuits are fried as he is knocked 
unconscious while the pod begins repairs on him and the pod itself.  The pod 
will land on the island of Ireland sometime later today.

OOC: I hope you enjoy this post and many more from me. This post was made to 
basically tell you the basic on my first character Hugar.  I hope everyone 
has a nice day :)(:
